ing: 2 cups milk, or more to taste
1/4 cup oats, or more to taste
des: "This is one of my favorite drinks to make when having a family breakfast or before/after a workout! You could add ice or cinnamon to your drink if you want more than just a regular smoothie."
ins: Blend milk, strawberries, sugar, oats, and egg together in a blender until smooth and creamy.
